block.p: Suzanne Lauren Ornstein and Michael Blau were married last evening by Rabbi Barry Hewitt Greene at the Headquarters Plaza Hotel in Morristown, N.J.

Mrs. Blau, 25, works in bond underwriting at the Hamilton Group in Cedar Knolls, N.J. She graduated from Arizona State University. She is a daughter of Judith and William Ornstein of Livingston, N.J. Her father is an executive vice president at Herbert J. Sims & Company, an investment bank in Roseland, N.J.
Suzanne Lauren Ornstein and Michael Blau were married last evening by Rabbi Barry Hewitt Greene at the Headquarters Plaza Hotel in Morristown, N.J.

Mrs. Blau, 25, works in bond underwriting at the Hamilton Group in Cedar Knolls, N.J. She graduated from Arizona State University. She is a daughter of Judith and William Ornstein of Livingston, N.J. Her father is an executive vice president at Herbert J. Sims & Company, an investment bank in Roseland, N.J.

Mr. Blau, 27, is an account executive at Commercial Furniture Interiors in Mountainside, N.J. He graduated from West Virginia University. He is a son of Hoda and Robert Blau of Short Hills, N.J. His father is president of W B Wood New York, a furniture dealer in Manhattan. His mother is the executive director of the St. Barnabas Development Foundation in Livingston.
